title: Raise Data Recovery v5.10 - FAT NTFS - {K!llERoY512}
description:
[img]http://yuq.me/users/21/716/wBAnhFzLd3.png[/img]


[size=200][b]Raise Data Recovery v5.10 - FAT NTFS - {[color=red]K!llERoY512[/color]}[/b][/size]

[img]http://yuq.me/users/21/716/ZEAxudqzPL.gif[/img]
[quote][b]Raise Data Recovery for FAT / NTFS - two programs that are designed for self-recovery by non-professionals. Supports data recovery from NTFS, FAT, FAT32, including FAT12, FAT16, FAT32

Using a sector scan allows us to achieve the best results when recovering data from flash drives and memory cards.[/b][/quote]

[quote][b]-:: [color=green]Key features[/color] ::-
- Restore the files to a FAT (including FAT12, FAT16, FAT32) and NTFS partitions hard disk drives
- Restore accidentally deleted files
- Restore the files on formatted partitions
- Restore files damaged by virus attacks
- Data recovery on flash drives and memory cards
- Unique feature a sector scan
- High speed and excellent output quality
- User-friendly interface
- Many other features and characteristics[/b][/quote]

[quote][b]-:: [color=green]The key product features include[/color] ::-
Host OS: Supported Microsoft Windows 2000, XP, 2003 Server, Vista, 2008 Server. Raise Data Recovery works with Windows 7.
Recognized file systems: FAT and NTFS (Windows); HFS + / HFSX and old HFS (Apple Mac OS); Ext2, Ext3, Ext4, XFS, ReiserFS and JFS (Linux); UFS and UFS2 (Unix, BSD, Sun Solaris; both Sparc / Power and x86/x64 editions); traditional NWFS (Novell Netware); vendor customizations to XFS and UFS file systems.
Multiple styles of disk partitions layout: Supported all major styles of disk partitions layout used with supported file systems.
RAID recovery: only supported with RAID Access Plugin - RAID Builder.
Recovery: lost file systems recovery, deleted files recovery (undelete), damaged file systems reconstruction.
Localization: Raise Data Recovery identifies localized file names even on non-unicode file systems and recognizes UTF-16, UTF-8 and ASCII with local code pages.
Additional features: Save / restore scan results.[/b][/quote]

[quote][b]Operating System : Windows 7/Vista/XP
Bit : X86 (32 bit) and X64 (64 bit)
Language : English[/b][/quote]
